TestInformation.Title: PTS Grapher
TestInformation.SubTitle: PHP + GD Library PNG Rendering
TestInformation.Description: This is a simple benchmark of pts_Graph, pts_LineGraph, and pts_BarGraph, which are graphing libraries written for the Phoronix Test Suite that use PHP and the GD graphics library. This test will time how long it takes to generate 5,000 graphs.
